system.description: You imbue inanimate plants with mobility and a semblance of life. Each animated plant attacks whomever you designate as though it were an animated object of the appropriate size. You may animate one Large or smaller plant per three caster levels (Huge counts as two, Gargantuan as four, Colossal as eight). You can change the designated target as a move action. Use animated object statistics; plants smaller than Large usually have no hardness. Alternatively, imbue all plants within range with mobility so they entwine creatures (effect of entangle; lasts 1 hour/level). Cannot affect plant creatures or nonliving vegetable material.
system.target: One Large plant per 3 caster levels or all plants within range
